meanings.definition: A carbohydrate whose molecules consist of a number of sugar molecules bonded together.
meanings.sent1: Polysaccharides provide energy for the body.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study how polysaccharides affect our health.
meanings.sent3: The playful polysaccharides danced in the bloodstream.
meanings.sent4: Her love for sweets was like a chain of polysaccharides, binding her cravings.
meanings.sent5: The colorful polysaccharides under the microscope looked like a bustling city.

meanings.definition: Complex carbohydrates made up of multiple sugar units.
meanings.sent1: Our diet should include foods rich in polysaccharides.
meanings.sent2: Polysaccharides are essential for proper digestion.
meanings.sent3: The polysaccharides threw a party in the stomach.
meanings.sent4: The bond between friends was as strong as polysaccharides holding hands.
meanings.sent5: The complex structure of polysaccharides amazed the students in biology class.
